hotels.title: Maui Authentic Hawaiian Beachfront Resort by Outrigger with Cultural Activities
hotels.description: Embrace the true essence of Hawaii on the picturesque Maui beachfront at Outrigger Ka'anapali Beach Resort. This authentically Hawaiian resort offers the ultimate island experience, including a program of cultural activities, from lei-making to hula dancing. Explore the vibrant Whalers Village and embark on a historic journey along the Lahaina Historic Trail. After a day of adventures, retreat to the resort's beachfront cabanas or indulge at Maui Brewing Company and Pau Hana Pool Shack.

hotels.title: Maui Tropical Beachfront Paradise with Onsite Dining, Three Pools & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Soak up the sun-drenched allure of Maui's southern coastline with a stay at this five-star Fairmont sanctuary, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Pacific Ocean. Set on 22 acres of pristine beachfront and lush tropical gardens, this Hawaiian sanctuary invites you to unwind in spacious suites and villas, each private lanais showcasing the island’s laid-back elegance. Relish in award-winning dining at Kō Restaurant and sip handcrafted cocktails at Pilina - Fairmont Kea Lani’s Premier Lounge. For seafood lovers, Nick’s Fishmarket Maui promises a feast of ocean-fresh delicacies. Indulge in three shimmering pools, embrace the spirit of Hawaii through cultural experiences, or walk on the soft white sands of Polo Beach.
